title: Simple Grilled Chicken
description: A juicy and flavorful grilled chicken breast, perfect for a quick and healthy meal.
instructions: Rub chicken breasts with olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

title: Classic Garden Salad
description: A crisp and refreshing garden salad with a simple vinaigrette dressing.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the chopped lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil and red wine vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.

title: Creamy Garlic Pasta
description: A rich, garlicky pasta tossed in a creamy sauce with herbs.
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente; drain and set aside.
In a pan, melt butter and saut√© garlic until fragrant.
Stir in cream, bring to a simmer.
Add parmesan, season, and combine with pasta.
